amendment.description: To strike the authority to provide living quarters and allowances to the United States Representative to the United Nations.

action.text: Amendment SA 291 proposed by Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S3260-3261; text: CR S3260) To strike the authority to provide living quarters and allowances to the United States Representative to the United Nations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 291 proposed by Senator Sessions.
